body.content:
-- 
How are doing , Hope you are doing great
I’m pleased to introduce you to Standard Chartered Loan & Investment. We
bring together and manage a multi - billion dollar portfolio of local,
regional and international investment, which we wish to re-invest 
through
project funding in investment loan to third party investors, project 
owners
and general business facilitators on a 3% loan interest rate per annum 
on
long & short term investment projects on a minimum and maximum face 
value
of 50,000 Euros to 1 Billion Euros .
If this is of interest to you or you, we would love to be a resource for
you. For more details regarding our funding program, please feel free to
contact us at bill.sanness234@outlook.com

I am respectfully asking you to drop a line even if this is of no 
interest
to you at this moment.

Thanks
Bill Sannes
Standard Chartered Loan & Investment
